thread.title: Kasmira
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Kasmira

author: Kasmira
title: Kasmira
text: Went to their location on Fordham and worked with Michael F. He was and is always absolutely helpful, friendly, and makes everything extremely clear and concise. I have had issues with their other locations but I will keep returning to their Fordham Road Location in the Bronx as long as Michael and his team are available for completing taxes. Thank you for another year of great service.
